title: Love Is Not a Romance Novel
description: This romantic novella is book two of Chase and Rowan's adventures and the sequel to Life is Not a Country Song.Chase and Rowan are given some time to learn more about each other when the last leg of their trip is delayed. Rowan see's it as a way to show Chase everything the Southwest has to offer,including her, while Chase is more worried about earning her keep and making sure one special little colt is strong enough to travel. Trust and understanding are tested, and some internal demons are laid to rest against the backdrop of sun-kissed mesas and tall pines. Both spiritual and sensual, the ladies discover that some journeys aren't measured by how many miles you travel, but by how far you are willing to take your heart.
author: Rhavensfyre
